imdb.title: BanG Dream!
imdb.plot: The series revolves around Kasumi Toyama, a high school student who looking for the "Star Beat", a sparkling and exciting sound which she heard while looking up at the night sky during her childhood days. Ever since then, she is c...

episodes.title: It's The Ultimate Dream, Don't You Think!?
episodes.plot: Three months after Poppin'Party's self-sponsored live show, the local live house owners, including CiRCLE's Marina Tsukishima, organize the BanG Dream Girls Band Challenge, a tournament with the final taking place at the Nippon Budokan.

episodes.title: Scared to Death
episodes.plot: After not performing in RAS' encore, Rokka is chased by CHU2 and PAREO in school and around town the next day, wanting to scout her for RAS. In the meantime, CHU2 meets with Yukina, reiterating her challenge to Roselia.

episodes.title: I'm Not Leaving!
episodes.plot: The preliminaries for the BanG Dream Girls Band Challenge begin with the top two teams in vote count going to the finals at the Budokan.

episodes.title: Them Lil' Octopus Sausages
episodes.plot: With Rokka joining as the (temporary) guitarist of RAISE A SUILEN, the band heads to a film studio to shoot a music video of their new song.

episodes.title: PoPi-V!
episodes.plot: Inspired by RAISE A SUILEN's music video, Poppin'Party decide to make one of their own.

episodes.title: This is it.
episodes.plot: RAS and Roselia prepare for the band battle that is held at Dub Live House.

episodes.title: Save Them In The Music
episodes.plot: Roselia reflect upon their performance and prepare for the Over the Future concert.

episodes.title: Should We Be Lounging Around Right Now?
episodes.plot: After the old shopkeepers from the Jizo-dori shopping district break their backs just before their trip to the hot springs, everyone (except CHU2 and PAREO) go in their place. After settling into their rooms, the members from different bands interact and socialize with each other.

episodes.title: Let's Go, PoPiPa
episodes.plot: Hoping to gain more votes, Poppin'Party plan a three-week schedule of live performances.

episodes.title: Vocalists are... Like Stars...
episodes.plot: After Masuki leaves the impromptu RAS meeting, Rokka looks for her but to no avail. Meanwhile, Rei meets Tae and talks to her whether she still cares about RAS.

episodes.title: PAREO No Longer Exists
episodes.plot: In Chiba, Rokka and Masuki search for PAREO by visiting her school. The two spot her as she is walking home, prompting her to run away and for them to give chase. Upon catching up to her, they learn of her background.

episodes.title: A Concert With PoPiPa!
episodes.plot: Bringing Poppin'Party and RAS together in Galaxy Live House, Marina announces which band will proceed to the finals at the Budokan.

episodes.title: This... This Right Here is the Girl Band Generation!
episodes.plot: The Girls Band Challenge finals arrive as Poppin'Party, RAS and Roselia assemble at the Budokan.

episodes.title: Happy Party!
episodes.plot: Kasumi and her friends start their second year of high school. After school, Poppin'Party and other girl bands perform at the Galaxy live house.

episodes.title: BLACK SHOUT
episodes.plot: Kasumi and her friends start planning their self-sponsored live show, but become overwhelmed by the sheer amount of planning behind a live event.

episodes.title: Sing Girls
episodes.plot: Kasumi and her friends feel doubtful about self-sponsoring their own live show after playing at Roselia's show.

episodes.title: Goka! Gokai!? Nobbinobi Warudo!
episodes.plot: Hello, Happy World puts on a live show on a cruise ship for Poppin'Party.

episodes.title: Ame no Ring-Dong-Dance
episodes.plot: Pastel*Palettes prepare to perform in the World Idol Festival. However, Chisato has to attend to other commitments, making practicing together difficult.

episodes.title: You Only Live Once
episodes.plot: Afterglow is invited to perform an outdoor live show in the market street for an elderly group. Poppin'Party also tag along to perform at the live show.

episodes.title: Nakanai Nakanai
episodes.plot: The students of Haneoka Girls' High School and Hanasakigawa Girls' High School prepare for a joint cultural festival.

episodes.title: Hitori Janain Dakara
episodes.plot: Tae talks to the Poppin'Party members that she wants to be a support guitarist for Layer's new band in order to improve her skills.

episodes.title: School Festival Symphony
episodes.plot: The students at Haneoka Girls' High School and Hanasakigawa Girls' High School hold their joint cultural festival with each class running their own booths. Meanwhile, Tae continues practicing with RAISE A SUILEN in preparation for their first live shows.

episodes.title: RÂ·IÂ·OÂ·T
episodes.plot: Getting back together after the joint cultural festival, Poppin'Party go around and thank members of other bands and Rokka for covering them during the concert.

episodes.title: Star Tears
episodes.plot: CHU2 meets with Poppin'Party and reiterates her desire to have Tae in her band.

episodes.title: Returns
episodes.plot: Poppin'Party practice and prepare for their live show at the Galaxy live house, also continuing to refine Tae's new song. Other bands accept Poppin'Party's invitation to perform at their live house, providing their set lists.

episodes.title: Kizuna Music
episodes.plot: The five bands set up and prepare at the Galaxy live house for Poppin'Party's live show.

episodes.title: We Met!
episodes.plot: One day, as she's still adjusting to her new high school, Kasumi Toyama discovers a trail of stars that leads her to an old thrift store. Inside, she makes a discovery of a star-shaped guitar.

episodes.title: We Did It!
episodes.plot: Kasumi's heart is set on forming a band, but Arisa wants nothing do with it. In fact, Arisa is so determined to avoid her that she puts the star-shaped guitar up for auction.

episodes.title: I Ran Away!
episodes.plot: Kasumi asks Rimi to join her band, but Rimi is reluctant. Meanwhile, Glitter*Green runs into an issue on the way to their show.

episodes.title: I Got Angry!
episodes.plot: Kasumi starts staying after school to take guitar lessons from Tae. Meanwhile, Arisa seems to have a problem with all the time they are spending together.

episodes.title: My Heart Was Racing!
episodes.plot: Kasumi, Tae, Rimi, and Arisa are preparing for their first performance. Are they going to be ready in time?

episodes.title: I Made It!
episodes.plot: Kasumi begins to struggle in school and enlists Saaya's help. Meanwhile, Arisa has been searching for the perfect band name.

episodes.title: We Fought!
episodes.plot: Kasumi has a tall order in convincing Saaya to join Poppin'Party, is she able to do it? Meanwhile, they continue to get ready for the Culture Festival.

episodes.title: I Ran!
episodes.plot: The Cultural Festival preparations are done, and it is time for it to begin. Meanwhile, Poppin'Party play their first show. How does it go?

episodes.title: I Got a Job!
episodes.plot: Saaya gets a new drum set and the girls all get jobs at Space. They learn what goes into putting on a live show.

episodes.title: I Got Surprised!
episodes.plot: Poppin'Party auditions at Space but to play there you must impress the owner. Do they achieve their dream?

episodes.title: I Couldn't Sing Anymore
episodes.plot: Kasumi is still struggling to find her voice but the rest of Poppin'Party is there to help pick her up.

episodes.title: I Sparkled?!
episodes.plot: Poppin'Party gets another chance to play at Space. Will they finally impress the owner?

episodes.title: Utatchatta!
episodes.plot: Kasumi finally achieves her dream as Poppin'Party plays at Space's last show. How will they perform?

episodes.title: OVA: Ason jatta!
episodes.plot: Poppin'Party and Roselia decide to go to the beach.
